DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Motivos
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Retrabalho por Motivos","WidgetType":"pie","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":32,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":15,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Jobs","metricFieldValue":"JobsGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  v.Motive,
		v.Jobs,
		(sum(v.Jobs) over ()) JobsGrandTotal
from
(
		select	v.Motive, 
				sum(1) as Jobs 
		from	SkillAnalyticsReWork v
					left outer join Department d on d.Oid = v.DepartmentId
		where	v.Motive is not null
				/*[DateFilter]*/ and cast(v.[ModifiedOn] as Date) between @FromDate and @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/
				and Year(v.ModifiedOn) = @year
				and (v.CompanyId = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
				and (d.Division = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
				and (v.DepartmentId = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
		group by 
				v.Motive
) v","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department","year"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Top 10 Executores
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Retrabalho por Executores","WidgetType":"pie","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":16,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":15,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Projects","metricFieldValue":"JobsGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select	v.Executors,
		v.Jobs,
		(sum(v.Jobs) over ()) JobsGrandTotal
from
(
		select	v.Executors, 
				sum(1) as Jobs 
		from	SkillAnalyticsReWork v
					left outer join Department d on d.Oid = v.DepartmentId
		where   v.Executors is not null
				/*[DateFilter]*/ and cast(v.[ModifiedOn] as Date) between @FromDate and @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/
				and Year(v.ModifiedOn) = @year
				and (v.CompanyId = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
				and (d.Division = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
				and (v.DepartmentId = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
		group by 
				v.Executors
) v","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department","year"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: An?lise de Retrabalho
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Retrabalho por Departamento, Cliente & Projeto","WidgetType":"pivotgrid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":15,"WidgetRows":16,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Jobs","metricFieldValue":"JobsGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select	v.Client,
		v.Department,
		v.Project,
		v.Jobs,
		(sum(v.Jobs) over (Partition by Department)) JobsPerDepartment,
		(sum(v.Jobs) over (Partition by Client)) JobsPerClient,
		(sum(v.Jobs) over ()) JobsGrandTotal
from
(
		select	v.CommercialClient as Client,
				v.Department,
				v.Project, 
				sum(1) as Jobs 
		from	SkillAnalyticsReWork v
					left outer join Department d on d.Oid = v.DepartmentId
		where   (1 = 1)
				/*[DateFilter]*/ and cast(v.[ModifiedOn] as Date) between @FromDate and @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/
				and Year(v.ModifiedOn) = @year
				and (v.CompanyId = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
				and (d.Division = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
				and (v.DepartmentId = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
		group by 
				v.CommercialClient,
				v.Department,
				v.Project
) v","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department","year"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Top 10 Projetos
